author: jteisberg
title: Quick note...
review: Just saying.  I got this "set" when the Monster fighters series came out here in MINNESOTA USA at my LEGO store when i bought the ghost train.  I looked online to check off that i owned it but couldn't find it.   Guess it was part of a $75+ spending thing and got it free.  So i'm not sure how much its worth.  But never the less i was very exited.  The parts are very unique and super cool.   I especially love the pants...
